tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS True isArrayEIGEN_INPUT False output_data_PCA $output_data_PCA output_data_EIGEN $output_data_EIGEN name SAGA.statistics_grid.8 GRIDS $GRIDS EIGEN_INPUT $EIGEN_INPUT METHOD $METHOD COMPONENTS $COMPONENTS OVERWRITE $OVERWRITE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PCA $OutputSection_PCA.outputType_PCA transmissionMode_PCA $OutputSection_PCA.transmissionMode_PCA outputType_EIGEN $OutputSection_EIGEN.outputType_EIGEN transmissionMode_EIGEN $OutputSection_EIGEN.transmissionMode_EIGEN

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: EIGEN_INPUT
param.label: Eigen Vectors
param.help: Use Eigen vectors from this table instead of calculating these from the input grids. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: COMPONENTS
param.label: Number of Components
param.help: number of first components in the output; set to zero to get all

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PCA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_EIGEN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_EIGEN
param.label: Eigen Vectors
param.help: Store calculated Eigen vectors to this table, e.g. for later use with forward or inverse PCA.

tool.help: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) for grids. PCA implementation is based on F.Murtagh's code as provided by the StatLib web site.
